# Inline evaluation

```{code-cell} ipython3
a = 1
```

Evaluated inline variable: {eval}`a`

```{eval} a
```

```{code-cell} ipython3
import base64
from IPython.display import Image
string = ""
img = Image(base64.b64decode(string))
```

```{eval:figure} img
A caption
```
